article.summary: Machine learning is a burgeoning new technology for mining knowledge from data, a technology that a lot of people are starting to take seriously. But what is it all about? This tutorial will introduce some fundamental terms in machine learning with some toy exmaples.

section.p: We are overwhelmed with data. There is a growing gap between the generation of data and our understanding of it. Data mining is the process of discovering patterns in data.
Many techniques for finding and describing structural patterns in data are developed within the field known at machine learning.

What is meant by structural pattern? How do you describe them? And what form does the input take? We will answer these questions by way of illustration rather than by attempting formal, and ultimately sterile, definitions.
